oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Girl being angry with her mother, because the latter asked her for a certain kind of food which she had put to roast in the fire, threw it with the wood-ashes that were upon it, into the air. The food was changed into stars, and the ashes became the Milky Way. By |han=kasso (L VIII.-10. 6879-6884). !huin
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !huin The new maiden who threw into the sky; which became stars, and the wood ashes which were upon it, the Milky Way
